Werner Guminski is CEO, Global Practices and Region Europe.

Mr. Guminski has been in the marketing research and consulting business for more than 20 years. He has been Managing Director of TNS Healthcare, a Kantar Health legacy company, since 1989 and has been responsible for global portfolio development since 2007.

Mr. Guminski joined the Board of Kantar Health as CEO for Global Practices and Region Europe in 2009. He has experience in prescription brand and stakeholder management and global pricing and reimbursement strategies.
